content.full_text: Receipt of Denton Offutt to William Sampson, 21 April 18321 Received ofWilliam Sampsonin full of all demands up to this day.
paragraphs: Receipt of Denton Offutt to William Sampson, 21 April 18321 Received ofWilliam Sampsonin full of all demands up to this day.

footnotes.text: 1Abraham Lincoln wrote the entirety of this document.

2Lincoln wrote this note while employed as a clerk in Denton Offuttâ€™s store inNew Salem, Illinois. This payment likely satisfied debts that William Sampson  owed Offutt
                  for goods at the store.

Received ofWilliam Sampsonin full of all demands up to this day.
